REMARK_LINE: AS PER AGREEMENT BETWEEN FHWA AND KYTC, THIS AUTHORIZATION PROVIDES $15,065,968 ($12,045,574 (80%) FEDERAL SHARE AND $3,011,394 (20%) STATE SHARE) FOR AWARD OF PRICING PACKAGE AMENDMENT #1 AUTHORIZING KIEWIT INFRASTRUCTURE SOUTH CO (THE CONTRACTOR) TO FURNISH AND DELIVER STRUCTURAL STEEL FOR NORTHBOUND AND SOUTHBOUND MAINLINE BRIDGES BIN 056B00183N(KENTUCKY/BROOK) AND BIN 056B00179N (CSX/HILL/BURNETT) PRIORITY REPLACEMENT BRIDGES ALONG I-65 IN LOUISVILLE, KENTUCKY.
